titleStmt.title: A newe pathway vnto praier ful of much godly frute and christe[n] knowledge, lately made by Theodore Basille.
titleStmt.author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Botulphe lane at the sygne of the whyte Beare, by me Iohn̄ Mayler for Iohn̄ Gough,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
